Title: Relates to the crime of fraud during a state disaster emergency
Summary: Establishes the crime of fraud during a state disaster emergency, where a person is guilty of fraud during a state disaster emergency when he or she commits any fraud during a state disaster emergency utilizing false or fraudulent pretenses, representations or promises involving the disaster for which such state disaster emergency was declared.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to the crime of fraud during a state disaster emergency
